body:
Thank you for your prompt response, Alex. 
Sorry for the late reply.
>Yes filepath.EvalSymlinks is supposed to return the same path (same string) for the same file. 

I see.

>I am not sure what your proposal is. Feel free to send a CL to demonstrate. It can be quick and dirty. We can improve it, if it is a good solution.

OK. I'll try to make a prototype within this week.
